title: Bundles vulnerable copy of Expat - please update to 2.2.5
body:
Issue moved from https://github.com/mono/linux-packaging-skiasharp/issues/1. 

@hartwork commented:

>This repository bundles an outdated vulnerable copy of Expat 2.1.0. Please update your copy to version 2.2.1 with the latest security fixes. A change log with details is available at https://github.com/libexpat/libexpat/blob/master/expat/Changes . Thank you!

> VS bug [#738684](https://devdiv.visualstudio.com/DevDiv/_workitems/edit/738684)

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body:
According to this post, wee should be selecting our own versions of he dependencies: https://groups.google.com/forum/#!topic/skia-discuss/RIPQqRjcVEE

We probably need to go through the list in https://github.com/mono/skia/blob/xamarin-mobile-bindings/DEPS and make sure we are up to date.

comments.author: spsteve10
comments.body: @mattleibow Can we expect a release with an updated version of expat (ie:2.2.5)? What is the status? Thanks

comments.author: hartwork
comments.body: (Just for completeness: There is libexpat 2.2.**6** by now.)

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body: I will see if I can get the update with the latest version of the dependencies.

comments.author: hartwork
comments.body: For the record, there is 2.2.**9** by now with more security fixes in 2.2.**8**.

comments.author: Manntoshh
comments.body: Thanks for the response with the PR @mattleibow Hoping for a quick review.

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body: Merged and will be in the next 1.68.2 preview
